resources.string: You have denied location permission access, this app needs them to work properly.
Do you want Cancel the Run?
Are you sure to cancel the current run and delete all its data?
For starting step counting service, you need first shout down tracking service, Are you sure to shouting down the current tracking and delete all its data?
Are you sure to Exit this App?
Are you sure to Reset Tracking? All of your Tracking Activity will be lost.
Please allow all time access to this app for proper tracking of your activity.
Are you sure to delete all activity of this day?
For deleting this day, you need first stop all running service, do you want stop all service that related to this app?
If you don\'t need this app count your steps please press stop button, because this app would consume your device power in background.
This app cant Count your steps and Tracking your walking in the same time, if your want tracking your walking Please save your steps detail to Database.
